cgcloud__KPI_Set__c.name: cgcloud__KPI_Set__c
cgcloud__KPI_Set__c.description: This table contains information about KPI Set Configuration.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

cgcloud__Child_Object_Dependency__c.description: Specifies whether the KPI Set is dependent on child objects.

cgcloud__Configuration__c.description: Describes the configuration in JSON format.

cgcloud__Description_Language_1__c.description: Description of the KPI set in language 1.

cgcloud__Description_Language_2__c.description: Description of the KPI set in language 2.

cgcloud__Description_Language_3__c.description: Description of the KPI set in language 3.

cgcloud__Description_Language_4__c.description: Description of the KPI set in language 4.

cgcloud__Manual_Change__c.description: Indicates whether the offplatform configuration update is to be triggered in a async process.

cgcloud__Statistics__c.description: Contains statistics for the complete KPI set and the related subsets.

cgcloud__Usage__c.description: Defines the usage of the KPI set.
